DOC.brief_summary: The goal research investigate impact change opioid analgesic prescribing default quantity opioids prescribe acute non-cancer pain adult dentistry setting . We change prescribe default select short-acting opioid analgesic include immediate release oxycodone hydrocodone well codeine tramadol , include co-formulations acetaminophen . In cluster-randomized trial three Montefiore Medical Center dentistry site , evaluate impact intervention patient-level outcome use 18 month data ( 6 month pre-intervention 12 month post-intervention ) .
DOC.brief_title: Electronic Defaults Reduce Opioid Prescribing Dentistry Practices
